subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Lewis Hamilton will start from the pole position in the British Grand Prix, his first Formula One race in his home country. Hamilton had a fastest lap of 1 minute 19.997 seconds on the 3.2-mile circuit as time ran out in the qualifying session, edging Kimi Raikkonen by 0.102 seconds. Hamilton is trying to become the first Englishman since Damon Hill in 1994 to win the British Grand Prix.
